name: Birds of Paradise - DEMO
description:
Read the launch devlog!

Play through the Birds of Paradise demo/prologue as we gear up for our crowdfunding campaign, launching late July, 2022! Keep up with Fiendish Fiction on Twitter for production updates + campaign news... and follow the Kickstarter to be notified on launch!

New city, new job, new apartment, new life!

Fresh out of college, Robin thinks she’s hit the jackpot after landing a position as assistant manager to the Birds of Paradise; an upcoming boy band with dreams of making it big. Robin is thrilled to be working with such high-profile clients… though not everything is as glamorous as it first seems.

Disastrously, Robin is left high and dry when her boss unexpectedly quits, leaving the fresh-faced recent grad fully in charge of the band. Robin soon finds herself overwhelmed by the boys’ -- *ahem* -- flamboyant personalities.

Left to fend for herself and help the band find success, Robin must navigate constant aggravation as the band members vie for her attention. Still, she can’t help but find them endearing…

To make matters all the more complicated, rival femme fatale rock band the Birds of Prey are constantly trying to steal the boys’ spotlight.

Not only must Robin navigate her relationships with the Birds of Paradise and the Birds of Prey, but she must ensure both she and the band succeed... in life, love, and on the stage!

Birds of Paradise is still in early production. Goals for the full game include 120,000+ words, four male romance options, one female romance option, one friendship route, multiple endings (good and bad), over 10 unlockable illustrations, and a whole lot of hilarity.

This demo features:

8,000+ words
Two backgrounds
Original soundtrack
Six character sprites
One unlockable illustration

While you're waiting, play our previous release; Up All Night – a serene, psychological horror visual novel.
